DOC.brief_title: Sibling Oocyte Study Medium In Vitro Fertilization/Intracytoplasmic Sperm Injection ( IVF/ICSI ) With Human Serum Albumine
DOC.detailed_description: Cells attain IVF/ICSI procedure keep medium nurture cell . Until medium contain human serum albumine . The purpose study determine new medium human serum albumine add good medium conventionally use IVF/ICSI .
DOC.criteria: Couples seek IVF/ICSI . Female 38 year age . No two previous IVF/ICSI treatment without pregnancy . Regular menstruation period . No endocrine disease require treatment female . BMI 30 female . At least 8 mature follicle upon monitor 6 MII oocyte upon ICSI . Written informed consent . Low responder FSH . Females danger develop OHSS . Sperm sample ICSIquality .
